content: I recently launched a giveaway on my Instagram account, where followers could win a free photography e-book by following me and using the hashtag #photographygiveaway. The giveaway was a huge success, and I gained 50 new followers in just 3 days. The hashtag #photographygiveaway also started trending on Instagram, which gave me even more visibility. Can you help me understand how I can build on this momentum and keep the engagement going?
